protective_factors: Strong family bond/responsibility (Reason for living: 'I couldn't do that to them')
Denial of past attempts (confirmed by Safety Triage)
Willingness to engage with treatment plan (medication increase, behavioral activation)
risk_factors: High level of guilt and perceived burden ('letting everyone down')
Significant functional impairment (missed 3 days of work)
Insomnia/Early Morning Awakening (associated with severe depression)
Passive death ideation ('I just wish I could disappear sometimes')
clinical_actions: Monitor closely for worsening symptoms or emergence of active ideation/intent
Review safety plan and coping strategies
